data.name: ReadLegalReferral1
data.value: select top(1) CAS_NUMBER, IDENTIFIER, STATUS from CKT_LEGAL_REFERRAL where (CAS_NUMBER = @casNumber) and (IDENTIFIER > @identifier) and (STATUS in ('S', 'O'))

data.name: ReadLegalReferral2
data.value: select top(1) CAS_NUMBER, IDENTIFIER, STATUS from CKT_LEGAL_REFERRAL where (CAS_NUMBER = @casNumber) and (IDENTIFIER > @identifier) and (STATUS in ('C', 'R', 'W'))

data.name: ReadLegalReferral3
data.value: select top(1) CAS_NUMBER, IDENTIFIER, STATUS from CKT_LEGAL_REFERRAL where (CAS_NUMBER = @casNumber) and (IDENTIFIER < @identifier) and (STATUS in ('S', 'O'))

data.name: ReadLegalReferral4
data.value: select top(1) CAS_NUMBER, IDENTIFIER, STATUS from CKT_LEGAL_REFERRAL where (CAS_NUMBER = @casNumber) and (IDENTIFIER < @identifier) and (STATUS in ('C', 'R', 'W'))

data.name: ReadLegalReferral5
data.value: select top(1) CAS_NUMBER, IDENTIFIER, STATUS from CKT_LEGAL_REFERRAL where (CAS_NUMBER = @casNumber) and (STATUS in ('S', 'O'))

data.name: ReadLegalReferral6
data.value: select top(1) CAS_NUMBER, IDENTIFIER, STATUS from CKT_LEGAL_REFERRAL where (CAS_NUMBER = @casNumber) and (STATUS in ('C', 'R', 'W'))
